parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Zero-based index of control point whose radius to set

parameters.name: Dist2
parameters.description: Distance 2 radius for the control point of this asymmetric fillet

title: IVariableFilletFeatureData2.SetControlPointDistanceAtIndex
description: Sets the Distance 2 radius at the specified control point for the asymmetric fillet.
signature:
void SetControlPointDistanceAtIndex( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.Double
Dist2
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Zero-based index of control point whose radius to set

parameters.name: Dist2
parameters.description: Distance 2 radius for the control point of this asymmetric fillet

remarks:
Call
IVariableFilletFeatureData2::SetControlPointRadiusAtIndex
to set the Distance 1 radius for the control point of this asymmetric fillet.
